Roni

5'9" (175 cm)

Group (2022-present):
XD until Jan 16, 2023

Introduction

Roni is a South Korean singer and lyricist. He was a member of the group XEED and a pre-debut member of the group OFF THE CUFF under the stage name Rowoon. On March 26, 2021, he made his debut with the digital single, "You Are."

He debuted with XEED on December 1, 2022 with the EP "Dream Land". However, he left on January 17, 2023 due to personal circumstances, also leaving the agency Nature Space.
